Text: Oñ Be̩n-hedad, onu Siria, kʼabogu-wñ chaka jeju; amonu ogue̩gwa nyoke meji laño̩ jʼugbo-wñ kpʼamanya kpʼo̩kane̩ ogu wewe. Tak i mute̩gu akpala nyu Samaria kʼi la kʼogu bʼo̩.
Oñ i fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼef ewo le̩ ugbo Ehab onu Israe̩l. I kakini, Abu ku Be̩n-hedad ka de̩ kakini,
Ajifa-we̩ kpʼo̩jamalia-we̩ omi ne̩; kpʼamo̩ya-we̩ kpʼamo̩ma-we̩, abo ki chʼuto̩ ef uma omi ne̩ ge̩.
Tak onu Israe̩l dohi kakini, Alu kʼe̩ ka le̩, odu-mi, onu, abe̩le̩ i de̩: uwe̩ ne̩ mi kpʼe̩wñ du kʼu ne̩.
Tak amonuche̩ le̩ ño̩ mudabi wa ge̩, oñ ma kakini, Abu ku Be̩n-hedad ka de̩ kakini, Omi fʼone̩ kpe̩rʼuwe̩ ochochi ka kʼuwe̩ ki mʼajifa-we̩ kpʼo̩jamalia-we̩ kpʼamo̩ya-we̩ kpʼamo̩ma-we̩ ko wa ñwu mi;
omi muda akpe̩ abuko̩lo̩-mi wʼugbo we̩ adiko e̩gba-i o̩na, ama la atejane̩ ef unyi-we̩ kpʼef unyi unyi abuko̩lo̩ e-we̩, oñ e̩wñ du ki jʼo̩mo̩ ki rʼuwe̩ eju e-le̩ ama agwo̩nyʼu ku ma ko kwʼo̩mo̩ wa.

Tak onu Israe̩l fʼabogijo ane̩ le̩ chaka do̩ wa, oñ i kakini, Nagbo̩ko̩bʼume̩, me̩ go ta ku me̩ li alu kʼe̩ne̩-i atene e̩bie̩ne̩; todu i fʼuche̩ kpe̩rʼumi kʼu kʼamo̩ya-mi kpʼamo̩ma-mi kpʼajifa-mi kpʼo̩jamalia-mi ñw u; u la ko̩ n.
Tak abogijo chaka kpʼamone̩ le̩ du ka ñw u kakini, E̩ ki gbʼo̩ n, e̩ ki la je̩ n.

Todule̩ i ka ñw amonuche̩ Be̩n-hedad kakini, Me̩ ka ñw odu-mi, onu, ka kʼe̩wñ du kʼi fʼuche̩-wñ kpe̩rʼadu-wñ e̩gba ejodudu le̩, e-le̩ nache. I muda nʼugbo du kʼu nache e̩wñ kʼe̩ ka ef e-i n. Tak amonuche̩ le̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ le, oñ ma dabi adʼinabali le̩ ñw u ge̩.
Taku Be̩n-hedad fʼuche̩ kpe̩rʼu, oñ i kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼebutu Samaria anana bo̩jo̩ kʼamone̩ ku ma jʼugbo-mi ki ne̩ e̩kʼo̩wo̩ʼka e̩kʼo̩wo̩ʼka, mak amo̩jo̩ ki fʼabe̩le̩ che mi kpʼe-ki tule ta!
Tak onu Israe̩l dohi kakini, E̩ne̩ ki aji o̩logu ki je̩nyʼo̩la-wñ dab e̩ne̩ kʼi agwʼo̩ jʼane̩ n.
Oñ i lewatu abu ku Be̩n-hedad gbʼohi uche̩ kʼi kpe̩ abu kʼowñ kpʼamonu le̩ jʼef ebu-ma añmʼomi, i ka ñw abuko̩lo̩-wñ kakini, Me̩ kʼo̩la-me̩ dojo̩. Taku ma kwodojo̩ akobʼewo le̩.
E̩ la go, akache̩ʼka te̩me̩rʼEhab, onu Israe̩l, oñ i kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Uwe̩ cheli o̩wo̩ amone̩-i chaka? Go, omi amʼuma ko jʼef o̩wo̩-we̩ eñini-i; tak uwe̩ ama ka kʼomi che Jihofa.
Tak Ehab kakini, Lʼo̩wo̩ e̩ne̩? Tak i kakini, Alu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Lʼo̩wo̩ amagbadufu e-amagboji ojane̩ ojane̩-we̩. Tak i tene kakini, E̩ne̩ achane̩ ogu-i? Oñ i dohi kakini, Uwe̩.

Tak i mʼamagbadufu e-amagboji ojane̩ ojane̩ ko, aluka-ma chʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼogue̩gwa nyoke meji. Ubi le̩ tak i kʼamone̩ le̩ chaka wa jo̩, owñ chʼamo̩ma Israe̩l chaka, ma chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo mebie.
Taku ma ledufu o̩ro̩ka gbaa. Be̩n-hedad la dʼef ebu añmʼo̩te̩ ki mʼu, owñ kpʼamonu ogue̩gwa nyoke meji ku ma ate̩ko-wñ le̩.
Tak amagbadufu e-amagboji ojane̩ ojane̩ le̩ ledufu ejodudu. Oñ Be̩n-hedad fʼamone̩ kpuche̩, oñ ma kʼohi wa ñw u kakini, Aboke̩le̩ iche̩ka kwo Samaria; wa jo̩-i.
Tak i kakini, Ma nʼo̩lafia wa? Mu ma udeju udeju; dagba ma dufu wa ku ma jogu, mu ma udeju udeju.
Abe̩le̩ abo-i kwef ewo le̩ dufu, owñ chʼamagbadufu e-amagboji ojane̩ ojane̩ le̩ kpai abogu ku ma tʼuma ubi.
Tak e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma fʼe̩ne̩ʼka kpa oñ abo Siria ra. Abo Israe̩l la rano ma. Be̩n-hedad, onu Siria, muda tanʼanya manyʼamananya oñ i fʼuma o̩wo̩.
Tak onu Israe̩l ledufu oñ i fʼamanya kpʼo̩ko̩ogu o̩ko̩ogu gwodajane̩. I la fʼabo Siria kpa akpa kpa.
Tak akache̩ le̩ te̩me̩rʼonu Israe̩l, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Lo kʼe̩ fʼo̩la-we̩ ruko. E̩ fejuwo̩ e̩wñ ki dukpe̩ kʼe̩ che. Todu e̩gba kʼo̩do̩ muda onu Siria akogu wa bʼe̩ ge̩.
Oñ abuko̩lo̩ onu Siria ka ñw u kakini, Amo̩jo̩-ma chʼamo̩jo̩ oj uwo uwo, todule̩ ma nʼukpahiu tʼuwa le. A muda ajogu kpʼama egbili tak a anʼukpahiu tʼuma le chuu.
E̩wñ kʼuwe̩ lañʼache de̩, mʼamonu le̩ ko, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ kʼi kwʼe̩gu-wñ, kʼe̩ la kʼame̩nuto̩gba jʼe̩gu-ma;

kʼe̩ la fʼabogu kaluka ñw o̩la-we̩ ku ma wewe dab abogu ku ma lenyo̩ rʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ le̩. Anya ki dago e̩gu anya. O̩kane̩ ogu ki dago e̩gu o̩kane̩ ogu. Tak a ajogu kpʼama egbili. Abe̩le tak a anʼukpahiu tʼuma le chuu. Oñ i nyʼuma eti; i la fʼabe̩le̩ che.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba o̩do̩ tito̩, taku Be̩n-hedad kʼabo Siria wa jo, oñ i nyʼAfe̩k kʼi kʼogu bʼabo Israe̩l.
Tak abo Israe̩l kʼo̩la-ma jeju jo̩, oñ amone̩ kʼuje̩wñ wa ñwu ma. Taku ma ledo ma. Amo̩ma Israe̩l rujo̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼujo̩ amewo kekele meji; abo Siria la che̩ko̩ ane̩ le̩.

Tak e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ lewa ko̩la ñw onu Israe̩l kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Todabu kʼabo Siria kakini, Jihofa chʼO̩jo̩ e-oj uwo, i muda chʼO̩jo̩ ef o̩go̩ n; todule̩ nakʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ inaina-i nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩. Tak ama ama ka kʼomi che Jihofa.
Oñ ma rujo̩ akpejurʼomune̩ o̩jo̩ mebie. Tak o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ ma mʼo̩wo̩ ko de. Oñ amo̩ma Israe̩l fʼabo Siria ku ma le e̩re̩ ofo one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogume̩lu kpa o̩jo̩ʼkate.
Tak abo ki bo̩ ra nyi Afe̩k, tʼef ewo le̩, aku ewo o̩mo̩ la mugulo̩ abʼoji one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogu nyoke mebie ki bo̩ ma.

Tak abuko̩lo̩-wñ ka ñw u kakini, Go, a gbo̩ ka kʼamonu Israe̩l chʼonu ku ma ma gbegbe li ejumomi one̩ n; a agbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, e̩ je̩ ñw a kʼe̩gbanukpo lʼago, kʼa fʼiku da mʼoji, kʼa ki ledufu nyʼugbo onu Israe̩l. Ikani i agbʼoji-we̩ tane̩.

Abe̩le̩ ma fʼe̩gbanukpo lʼago oñ ma fʼiku da mʼoji-ma, taku ma nyʼugbo onu Israe̩l. Oñ ma kakini, Adu-we̩, Be̩n-hedad kakini, Nagbo̩ko̩bʼuwe̩, e je̩ ñwu mi deju. Tak i kakini, I deju ta? O̩maye-mi de̩,

Aboke̩le̩ le̩ la do̩ ka kʼe̩re̩ lile ma ko̩ le̩, oñ ma hika dʼalu nʼalu-wñ, oñ ma kakini, I-i, o̩maye-we̩, Be̩n-hedad le. Tak i kakini, Me̩ lo ku me̩ mʼu du wa. Taku Be̩n-hedad ledufu wʼugbo-wñ, oñ i je̩ ñw u mute̩gu wʼef o̩kane̩ ogu-wñ.

Taku Be̩n-hedad ka ñw u kakini, Ewo ewo du kʼata-mi bʼata-we̩ gba le̩ nakʼo dabiwa ñw e̩. Uwe̩ ki laño̩ chʼikpa-dala ikpadala ñw o̩la-we̩ Damaskus alu kʼata-mi che Samaria. Ehab kakini, E̩ kpʼalo abe̩le̩ kpʼomi mak u natʼe̩ no̩. Abe̩le̩ i fʼalo kpe̩ kpʼowñ, oñ i tʼowñ no̩ kʼi lo.
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka ef amo̩ma amakache ka ñw ekeji-wñ lʼugbo o̩la Jihofa kakini, Fʼumi gwo, agba! E̩ne̩ le̩ muda ko̩ egwʼo.
Tak i ka ñw u kakini, Todabu kʼe̩ ma gbʼomuʼJihofa gbo̩ n, go, ababa kʼe̩ kwʼugbo-mi alo, idu adʼe̩ kpa. Tak ababa kʼi kwo bʼo̩ te̩ idu fʼu li, oñ i mʼu du kpa.
Tak i fʼe̩ne̩ omune̩ li, oñ i kakini, Agba, fʼumi gwo. Tak e̩ne̩ le̩ fʼu gwo; i fʼu gwo o̩me̩me̩le̩ oñ i fʼu chagbe.
Tak akache̩ le̩ kwo bʼo̩mo̩ te̩, oñ i nyʼej o̩na anede onu. I la mʼukpo ko bʼeju ma kʼone̩ ki we emʼo̩.

Tak abu kʼonu alale i kwadʼonu, i kakini, Adu-we̩-i nyʼalumeji ogu ku ma ja le̩, e̩ la go, e̩ne̩ʼka muna adʼe̩ne̩ʼka wʼugbo-mi. I kakini, Fʼe̩ne̩-i de; iche̩wñ kʼi fʼe̩ o̩wo̩ alu du ki che kʼi le, mak oji-we̩ akoji oji-wñ, cho̩kpo̩ni ajifa alu tale̩nt oka e̩ ra ñwu mi.
Oñ abu kʼo̩wo̩ adu-we̩-i dʼef e̩wñ eche tʼemi tʼano̩mo̩, e̩ne̩ le̩ le. Tak onu Israe̩l ka ñw u kakini, Abe̩le̩ ajo̩-we̩ la ade̩; uwe̩ onugo fʼoji-wñ kpa me̩.
Tak i hika mʼukpo ko bʼeju-wñ te̩, oñ onu Israe̩l mejumʼowñ ka kʼi dʼef amakache̩.
Tak e̩ne̩ le̩ ka ñw onu kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Todabu kʼuwe̩ je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ kʼomi dute̩ ñw o̩la-mi fʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ le̩, todule̩ oji e-we̩ akoji oji-wñ, amone̩-we̩ la akoji amone̩-wñ ge̩.
Tak onu Israe̩l le tʼunyi-wñ, i nalañu, e̩do̩-wñ kpa nana, oñ i lewa Samaria.
